posts.post_content:
Have a bunch of cards I need to sell or trade. Will entertain trades for EPDGs I don't have.  

I'm willing to negotiate on the price of any of these, especially as part of package deal.  However, anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over ongoing negotiations.
 
$SOLD Lee Quillen SGC 80
$SOLD Charlie Rhodes SGC 60
$SOLD Oscar Stanage SGC 60
$SOLD Ed Willetts SGC 30
$SOLD Beals Becker PSA 5

$SOLD Steamer Flanagan SGC 70 with parts of a double back
$SOLD Cy Seymour Batting PSA 3
$SOLD Moose Grimshaw PSA 6
$SOLD Jesse Tannehill PSA 5
$SOLD Bill Sweeney PSA 5
